speech.text: The bugs come from a forest to the north.
Sometimes, at night, there are strange lights.
Every year the bugs push closer and closer.
Soon they'll be in the village.
That will be the end for us.
When the glove of the Lone Explorer touches the glowing orb, the room fills with light.
Press Z to power the Orb.
When enclosed in the Orb, the Lone Explorer is invulnerable to melee attacks and can float across gaps.
